name: Little Red Cap / Little Red Riding Hood
description:
If you'd like to support me and do more:
https://ko-fi.com/edgonkofi - commissions open!
If you're looking for a >>LoRA Making Tutorial<<

Little Red Cap / Little Red Riding Hood

Sit down and listen, to the story of the little red riding hood...

Dress your character like her!
